definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: She is at school before she becomes a barber.
sentences.chinese: 她當理髮員前，在學校上學。

sentences.english: I hope I remember to ask the barber not to cut my hair too short.
sentences.chinese: 但願我能記着請理髮員不要把我的頭髮剪得太短。

sentences.english: I am a barber, is not I?
The barber had cut your hair very short.
sentences.chinese: 理髮員把你的頭髮剪得很短。
